name: Home Alone (Demo/Unfinished)
description:
Home Alone is an interactive story (a hypertext adventure) going through the mind of a teenager in a desperate and emotional state of their mind, trying to either talk themselves into doing something rash or out of it because of their current situation. It has 11 Endings.

The game contains curse words and adult themes (suicide/self destructive tendencies/angst) and has lots of paths (although some unfinished) to take.

You can play this game on Philome.la: NOT AVAILIBLE YET.

This was made for 'My First Game Jam: Summer Edition (2016) in Twine using the Harlowe format.

Find me at @EljayRex on Twitter.
